title: Old Railway Station
description: A photograph of the railway station in 1950.

title: Traditional Basket Weaving
description: Story of the basket weaving techniques passed down through generations.

title: Gusii Traditional Music and Dance
description: Documentation of traditional songs and dances performed during weddings, harvest celebrations, and initiation ceremonies.

title: Gusii Traditional Attire
description: Photograph and explanation of traditional Abagusii clothing, including animal skins and beadwork worn during ceremonies.

title: Bananas as a Traditional Staple Food
description: For generations, bananas have been a key staple food among the Abagusii, prepared boiled, mashed, or mixed with vegetables in daily meals.

title: Keroka Town
description: A historical photograph of Keroka Town showing its growth as a commercial hub serving Kisii and Nyamira regions, known for trade in bananas, tea, and farm produce.
